settings.title: Can I order with Apple Pay?
settings.answer: If you would like to place an order with Apple Pay, Venmo, or Zelle, please send a message to @stashngrab on Discord.

settings.title: What will show up on my bank statement?
settings.answer: "SNG LLC" is what will show up on your bank statement if you place an order through our site.

settings.title: Is the packaging discreet?
settings.answer: We ship all our orders in black bubble mailers. It will NOT have the words "vape" or "stashngrab" anywhere on the package or shipping label to keep the order as discreet as possible.

settings.title: WHAT WILL SHOW UP ON MY BANK STATEMENT?
settings.answer: "PitStop.us" is what will show up on your bank statement if you place an order through our site.

settings.title: HOW LONG DOES SHIPPING USUALLY TAKE?
settings.answer: Shipping takes about 3-5 days on average, but can vary depending on many factors. Keep on eye on your tracking number to stay up to date on your package location.

settings.title: WHAT ARE PRE-ORDER ITEMS?
settings.answer: Pre-Order items are products from our latest collection that can be reserved ahead of time during a limited timeframe. By purchasing a Pre-Order item, you secure your chosen style and size before it becomes widely available. Estimated delivery windows are provided on the product detail page, though arrival may vary and could be earlier or later than expected. You can return your item(s) or cancel your Pre-Order in accordance with our Online Return Policy. For updates regarding your Pre-Order, please contact us.

settings.title: WHAT ARE BACK-ORDER ITEMS?
settings.answer: Back-Order items are products that are temporarily unavailable and cannot be shipped right away. Estimated delivery times are listed on the product detail page and may take several weeks, with your order possibly arriving earlier or later than stated. You can return your item(s) or cancel your Back-Order in accordance with our Online Return Policy. For updates regarding your Back-Order, please contact us.

settings.heading: Frequently asked Questions
settings.banner_subheading: Our customer service will be happy to help you.

.footer__linklist a {text-decoration: none; color: #fff; /* White color for links */ font-weight: 500;}
